long_desc: Ali Baba is here, hunting for the pharoah's tomb.
flags_raw: You see a tall, full-bearded man with a mischevious glint in his eye.  Ali Baba
stats1_raw: has made his life from stealing things from others, including many items stolen
stats2_raw: recently from under the nose of the hapless guardians of this pyramid.  Someday
stats3_raw: he might get caught, but not today...
